timeline.message: Provides a simple way of injecting metrics into entity exports.

Enables the metrics framework for the tests.

Otherwise startup warnings occur.

Reverts a version bump performed by dependabot.

With the new driver (8.0.x) the schema tool fails with
"Unknown table 'dailymetric' in information_schema".

A better solution is probably to completely abandon the
MySQL driver and switch over to the MariaDB one.
